title: CryptoEX.one
author: CryptoEX.one
content: Hello crypto enthusiasts, I'm here to write on behalf of our company CryptoExone (short for : CryptoEX.). We are located in Switzerland, and have been in Crypto business for 10 years. You can visit our shop/exchange office in person, I will make sure to post the address alongside our social contacts at the bottom of this post.Recently we have built our 7th Gen miner and decided to go international. Product name "CX7 Miner". Every piece of the miner is custom built by our team, apart from the frame which is outsourced. It has a fully functioning water cooling set up and is based on ASIC scrypt mining. You can read more about specifications on our product page - https://cryptoex.one/cx7-minerInternational shipping is available, miner should reach your doorstep in 10 days if you are from EU, 14 days if you are from US and 21 days for the rest of the world. We have contracts with different shipping companies throughout the Europe therefore if you have a preference on a shipping company, please let us know within 3 days of your order. Every package is covered with warranty throughout shipping and can be tracked via designated shipping company. Our standard warranty is 24 months, which includes regular firmware updates.As of January 2023 we have limited the number of units we sell per each order (max 2.) due to the current lack of parts. If you are interested in ordering more than two please contact us for a quote first.---Our working hours are from 8am-5pm on Weekdays, 8am to 1pm on Saturday. You can reach us through DMs on Reddit, Twitter, Facebook or through our contact form https://cryptoex.one/contact-usOur Links ;Find us on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/CryptoEXoneFind us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/CryptoEXSupportWebsite - https://cryptoex.oneVisit us in person:Kuttigen 5024 WaldwegSwitzerlandGoogle Business - https://g.page/r/CeTFXpmNNS_lEBMBest Regards,Crypto EX.

comments.author: ncsupanda
comments.body: Obvious scam, anyone reading it should avoid.

comments.author: CryptoEX.one
comments.body: Quote from: ncsupanda on March 04, 2023, 03:48:34 PMObvious scam, anyone reading it should avoid.Hello, we appreciate your concerns. It is not in our intention to discredit anyone, we do take every feedback as a constructive criticsm but if you are not a customer nor your visited our office, please do not make such claims. We can be reached out through phone (make sure to use country extension) or through Email most of the day. Thank you.
